medical_summary.Summary: Physician: Have you tried any treatments so far Physician: Can you describe the pain Patient: Yes, I've been having lower back pain for about three months now

Subjective.Chief_Complaint: Physician: Hello, I understand you're here about back pain
Subjective.History_of_Present_Illness: Patient: Yes, I've been having lower back pain for about three months now

Objective.Physical_Exam: Based on patient description - detailed physical exam not recorded
Objective.Observations: Patient appears coherent and responsive based on dialogue

Plan.Follow_Up: Follow up as needed based on symptom progression
Medications: Analgesics as needed for pain management

patient_text: * Yes, I've been having lower back pain for about three months now. It started gradually but has been getting worse. * It's a dull ache that gets worse when I sit for long periods or bend over. Sometimes it radiates down my right leg. * I've been taking ibuprofen, which helps a little. I also tried some stretching exercises from online videos. * I can't garden anymore, which I love, and I have trouble sleeping through the night.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Physician
dialogue_turns.text: * Hello, I understand you're here about back pain. Can you tell me more?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Patient
dialogue_turns.text: * Yes, I've been having lower back pain for about three months now. It started gradually but has been getting worse.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Patient
dialogue_turns.text: * It's a dull ache that gets worse when I sit for long periods or bend over. Sometimes it radiates down my right leg.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Physician
dialogue_turns.text: * Have you tried any treatments so far?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Patient
dialogue_turns.text: * I've been taking ibuprofen, which helps a little. I also tried some stretching exercises from online videos.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Physician
dialogue_turns.text: * How has this affected your daily activities?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Patient
dialogue_turns.text: * I can't garden anymore, which I love, and I have trouble sleeping through the night.
